name: MightyAgentPodcast
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
I teach Real Estate Agents to scale using social media and automation. We've built together a community of Realtors I refer to as "Mighty Nation" and we gather online and at our in-person events "Mighty Meetups" all over the United States.

New Agent or Agents that never really got off the ground in Real Estate need support and guidance to take that next step. This show will give it to them.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
